serialization.name: Dialog
serialization.description: Dialog box. (Set Modal property for a modal dialog).

strings.jsxtext: This text is a property of the dialog's Caption Bar

Create dialogs as separate components, and then load them as children of your application's body block

The code that launched this dialog is:
sampledialogs32.getBodyBlock().load("components/simpleDialog.xml");

jsx3.app.Server.getBodyBlock() returns the body block for this server

Note that we explicitly refer to the application's namespace (sampledialogs32) as defined in the Project Deployment Options.

As a child of body block, the maximize button in the dialog's toolbar will expand the dialog to fill the entire application canvas. When dragged the dialog will typically appear in front of its peer children.
